title: The Bible - In The Beginning (1966)
description:
THE BIBLE: IN THE BEGINNING (1966)
Directed by John Huston

3-hour epic of scenes from the Book of Genesis, including: The Garden of Eden, Cain and Abel, Noah and the Great Flood, the story of Abram / Abraham, Sodom and Gomorrah.

From the late days of European / American co-productions of costume epics. This film is slow but sincere, reasonably accurate as regards the text, and not anachronistically moralistic like some other Bible movies (e.g. the Ten Commandments, Last Days of Sodom & Gomorrah, etc.).
